contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox book | name = Yargo | author = [[Jacqueline Susann]] | title_orig = YARGO: A Love Story. | genre = [[Science fiction]], [[romance novel|romance]] | publisher = [[Bantam Books]] | pub_date = {{Start date|1979|02|28}} | isbn = 0-553-12855-8 }} '''''Yargo''''' is a [[science fiction]] [[romance novel]] by [[Jacqueline Susann]]. Her husband found it among her things after her death and he had it published by [[Bantam Books]] on February 28, 1979.<ref name="lakeland ledger">{{cite news|last1=Gardner|first1=Hy|authorlink1=Hy Gardner|last2=Sloan|first2=Robin Adams|last3=Smith|first3=Liz|authorlink3=Liz Smith (journalist)|author4=Suzy|title=Jackie Susann Still Sells; First Novel To See Print|url=http://news.google.com/newspapers?id=1mVRAAAAIBAJ&sjid=9foDAAAAIBAJ&pg=7198%2C7366672|accessdate=3 June 2013|newspaper=[[Lakeland Ledger]]|date=November 25, 1978}}</ref> The original name for the novel was: ''YARGO: A Love Story''. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{Goodreads book|238344|Yargo}} *{{Google books|ySCjXTvS-pYC|Yargo}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Yargo}} [[Category:1979 novels]] [[Category:1970s science fiction novels]] [[Category:American science fiction novels]] [[Category:Mars in fiction]] [[Category:Venus in fiction]] [[Category:Romance novels]] [[Category:Novels by Jacqueline Susann]] [[Category:Novels published posthumously]] {{1970s-sf-novel-stub}}
